title: Thanksgiving Travelers Will Face High Gas Prices, Long Lines
sub_head: TSA expects to greet 20 million flyers; those driving will pay on average $3.40 a gallon for unleaded gas
body:
Gas prices remain high as millions of Americans take to the roads and sky this week to meet family and friends for Thanksgiving celebrations, according to AAA.
The national average price for a gallon of regular unleaded gas is $3.40, according to AAAâ€™s weekly gas report.
